description: Updates the aggregationPeriod for a monitor. Monitors support an aggregationPeriod of either 30 or 60 seconds. This action requires the monitorName and probeId parameter. Run ListMonitors to get a list of monitor names.

parameters.name: monitorName
parameters.description: The name of the monitor to update.

parameters.name: aggregationPeriod
parameters.description: The aggregation time, in seconds, to change to. This must be either 30 or 60.

nested_items.name: monitorArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the monitor that was updated.

nested_items.name: monitorName
nested_items.description: The name of the monitor that was updated.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the updated monitor.
